plot: In 2011, the Creators (Mike and Jerry) declared to the Penny Arcade office that a reality show based on web comics must be done. After a year of research and a successful Kick starter stretch goal, the stage had been set for 12 Artists flown from around the world to compete a cash prize and a year integrated into the Penny Arcade machine. Through a variety of events and challenges, these 12 will fight, claw, write, and draw until only one Artist remains. Friends may or may not be made.
title: Strip Search
